ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: This study was funded by National Key Research and Development Project “Climate Change Impact and Adaptation in Major Economies of the Belt and Road (2018YFA0606502)”, and “National Natural Science Foundation of China (2016, Grant No. 41601478)”. I am grateful to many colleagues at Institute of Geographic Sciences and Natural Resources, CAS, Forestry Department of Qinghai Province, and the State Forestry of Administration for their assistance in the data collection and processing, and thinking about conservation under climate change. I especially thank Prof. Xu Ming, Dr. Fen Zhao and Mr. Sheng Qingkai for the assistance in discussion and data processing.
